subject: Review of procurement procedure of Independent Engineer and other consultants for BOT and EPC Projects.
text: HTTdl 77rl  TTHFf gfeastut T9q Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 41 (&s6 qae7 r {TArf TATZ) #R7 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 MT National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) +i+-5 g 6, #4r7-10, Errq1, Tf farht-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No, 11041/218/2007-Admn Dated: 02.09.2013 Policy Matter-Technical (142/2013) (Decision taken on file No. NHAI/CMC/IE/201 1) Sub: Review of procurement procedure of Independent Engineer and other consultants for BOT and EPC Projects. The procurement procedure for various consultancy services of NHAI has been reviewed in 96ih meeting of the Authority and it has been decided that henceforth; for the procurement of Independent Engineer and other consultants for BOT and EPC Projects costing more than Rs: 750 crores, QCBS mode of procurement shall be adopted with 70.30 weightage for Technical and Financial scores. 2 For highly complex projects like construction of a tunnel/bridge, QCBS mode of procurement with 80.20 weightage for  technical and financial scores shall be adopted for appointment of   Independent Engineer Authority's Engineer for DBFOT and EPC projects; 3. For all other projects costing less than Rs.750 crores, the present least cost method for procurement of the said consultants woUld continue. 4 This is for compliance by all Divisions of NHAI with immediate effect. This shall also apply where RFP has been  invited but  proposal is to be received: 5 This issue with the approval of Competent Authority. (V.K. Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord) To AlLofticers and employees ot HQIROsPIUs[CMUs/Site Offices R1 Y NHAI yet
